alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:45PM EDT until April 10 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Lafayette to Vincennes. .Flooding continues along much of the Wabash River. More precipitation is in the forecast and this will result in prolonged flooding into mid to late next week. Those with interests along area waterways should monitor forecasts for the latest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 10... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Mount Carmel. * WHEN...Until Monday, April 10. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, Extensive lowland flooding in progress. Much of the flood plain activity is affected by high water. Numerous local river roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday /8:45 PM EDT Saturday/ the stage was 25.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Saturday /8:45 PM EDT Saturday/ was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday, April 09 and continue falling to 12.6 feet Tuesday, April 11. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
